title.name: Joak's Github Page
about-me.p1: I am an insightful software engineer who performs well at programming. I feel confident working with various major programming languages. I also have experience deploying AWS and on-premise applications, and working with a lot of other technologies like RabbitMQ, gRPC, ElasticSearch, OAuth2, etc. I am passionate about developing and willing to accept any challenges to enrich my skill set.
about-me.p2: I am also interested at AI and ML especially in NLP field, and feeling comfortable working with major ML frameworks such as PyTorch and TensorFlow 2. Moreover, I have working experience on web development, which helps deploying AI models on web.
language.comfortable: The programming languages I comfortably working with
github.checkout: Check out out my github repository to learn more!
